# chirimoya-form-cell

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                                                            | Type      | Default     |
| ----------- | ----------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `errorText` | `errortext` | text of the error message of the field.                                | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `hasError`  | `haserror`  | boolean that indicates if the form-cell should display the error alert | `boolean` | `undefined` |


## Slots

| Slot             | Description                                                                          |
| ---------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| `"form-control"` | <text-field/>, <select-field/> or <file-field/> - used to add the form type element. |
| `"trailing"`     | adds an element at the end of the cell.                                              |
